text: @realDonaldTrump @narendramodi It’s the least we can do since all those countries helped the USA when Draft Dodger donny kept stepping on his dick, and vomiting all over himself trying to recover from his denial and late incoherent response to COVID19!!!!  Still not enough tests for everyone 3 months later
